charges.charge_description: 18:875(c) and 18:2261A(2) - Transmitting in Interstate Commerce Communications Containing Threats to Injure the Person of Another;  Intent to Harass or Intimidate Another Person, Using an Interactive Computer Service or Electronic Communication Service, Engaged in a Course of Conduct that Placed a Person in Reasonable Fear of Death or Serious Bodily Injury and Caused and Would Reasonably be Expected to Cause Substantial Emotional Distress
